verbose_text: After incubation with AG490, the JAK2 / STAT3 signaling pathway was partially blocked, which caused a decrease in the Bax / Bcl-2 ratio and reduced cell apoptosis caused by HBx.
evidence: JAK2/STAT3 signaling pathway was partially blocked, which caused a decrease in the Bax/Bcl-2 ratio and reduced cell apoptosis
